# Distribution Package

This folder contains the production-ready files for the CV Portfolio website.

## File Structure

```
dist/
├── cv.html              # Main HTML file
├── favicon.ico          # Site favicon
├── css/                 # Stylesheets
│   ├── base.css
│   ├── sections.css
│   ├── components.css
│   └── animations.css
└── img/                 # Image assets (SVG)
    ├── circle2.svg
    ├── Group 29.svg
    ├── H_hightlight_01.svg
    ├── H_hightlight_01_0.svg
    ├── H_hightlight_02.svg
    ├── H_hightlight_02_0.svg
    ├── H_hightlight_03.svg
    ├── H_hightlight_03_0.svg
    ├── Know What You Own First.svg
    ├── Know What You Own First_hightlight.svg.svg
    ├── Opportunity Matrix.svg
    ├── Resource Fit Matrix.svg
    └── strategy tree.svg
```

## Usage

1. **Local Development**: Open `cv.html` directly in a browser
2. **Web Server**: Upload all files maintaining the folder structure
3. **GitHub Pages**: This folder can be used as the deployment source

## Total Size

- HTML: ~112 KB
- CSS: ~60 KB (4 files)
- Images: ~396 KB (13 SVG files)
- **Total: ~568 KB**

## Notes

- All file paths in `cv.html` use relative paths (`./css/`, `./img/`)
- The folder structure must be maintained for the site to work correctly
- All images are in SVG format for scalability
